actions.text: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Committee on Judiciary. Ordered to be reported in lieu of S.CON.RES. 125 with amendments favorably.
Committee on Judiciary. Reported to Senate by Senator Thurmond with amendments and an amendment to the title and an amended preamble. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 639.
Resolution agreed to in Senate with amendments and an amendment to the Title and an amended preamble by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution recognizing the achievements of the Ireland Fund and its founder, Dr. Anthony J. F. O'Reilly.

summary.text: (Measure passed Senate, amended) Recognizes the laudable charitable achievements of the Ireland Fund for its humane work on behalf of the people of Ireland.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution recognizing the achievements of the Ireland Fund and its founder, Dr. Anthony J. F. O'Reilly.
